title: 30 Of Amazon’s Best Summer Dresses For Every Occasion
description: With the days getting warmer and the deals getting bigger (hello, Prime Day), we can’t help but get into the summer — and shopping — spirit. As we look at our calendars stacked with barbecues, girls' nights out, vacations, and weddings, we’re both excited and overwhelmed by all the outfits we need to put together. Fortunately, Amazon (not-so-surprisingly) has a great selection of stylish swimsuits, comfy travel outfits, and even wedding guest dresses — making it easy to do all our shopping in one place.Looking for a summer dress on Amazon can feel daunting thanks to the sheer number of options, so we did the hard work for you. We scoured the retailer’s luxury shops (like Saks and Shopbop), reader-favorite brands (like Good American and Show Me Your Mumu), and top-rated finds. The result? A curated roundup of the best sundresses, vacation styles, and wedding guest looks — plus plenty of minis and maxis — for every warm-weather occasion, from work happy hours to graduation parties.Click through to shop 30 of our favorite Amazon dresses to refresh your summer wardrobe.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Best Amazon SundressesThe easiest one-and-done summer outfit? A sundress. And Amazon has plenty of standout styles to choose from. Think trendy milkmaid silhouettes, tie-front bodices, and billowing skirts — all with an effortlessly whimsical feel that’s perfect for brunches, backyard barbecues, and birthday dinners. We’re especially loving breezy linen styles and bold floral prints this season.MakeMeChic Boho Floral Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonHuhot Halter Neck Floral Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Essentials Empire Waisted Cotton Sateen Tiered Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonGanni Tie-Front Cotton Midi-Dress, $, available at AmazonGrace Karin Floral Square Neck Swing Dress, $, available at AmazonShy Velvet Contrast Linen Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Vacation Dresses Whether you’re jetting off to the tropics, heading to Europe, or planning a staycation, your vacation wardrobe deserves a refresh. From netted and crocheted fabrics to vibrant colorways and graphic stripes, Amazon has no shortage of dreamy, destination-ready dresses.Rails Tamara Dress, $, available at AmazonSweatyRocks Floral Print Cut Out Sleeveless Halter Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonZesica Sleeveless Striped Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonSignificant Other Oakleigh Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmanda Uprichard Dianella Dress, $, available at Amazonendless rose Off Shoulder Sleeveless Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Wedding Guest DressesIf your calendar is stacked with engagement parties and weddings this summer, don’t sleep on Amazon for special occasion dresses. Photo: Courtesy of Amazon.

With the days getting warmer and the deals getting bigger (hello, Prime Day), we can’t help but get into the summer — and shopping — spirit. As we look at our calendars stacked with barbecues, girls' nights out, vacations, and weddings, we’re both excited and overwhelmed by all the outfits we need to put together. Fortunately, Amazon (not-so-surprisingly) has a great selection of stylish swimsuits, comfy travel outfits, and even wedding guest dresses — making it easy to do all our shopping in one place.

Looking for a summer dress on Amazon can feel daunting thanks to the sheer number of options, so we did the hard work for you. We scoured the retailer’s luxury shops (like Saks and Shopbop), reader-favorite brands (like Good American and Show Me Your Mumu), and top-rated finds. The result? A curated roundup of the best sundresses, vacation styles, and wedding guest looks — plus plenty of minis and maxis — for every warm-weather occasion, from work happy hours to graduation parties.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Click through to shop 30 of our favorite Amazon dresses to refresh your summer wardrobe.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

1 of 30

Best Amazon Sundresses

The easiest one-and-done summer outfit? A sundress. And Amazon has plenty of standout styles to choose from. Think trendy milkmaid silhouettes, tie-front bodices, and billowing skirts — all with an effortlessly whimsical feel that’s perfect for brunches, backyard barbecues, and birthday dinners. We’re especially loving breezy linen styles and bold floral prints this season.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

7 of 30

Amazon Vacation Dresses

Whether you’re jetting off to the tropics, heading to Europe, or planning a staycation, your vacation wardrobe deserves a refresh. From netted and crocheted fabrics to vibrant colorways and graphic stripes, Amazon has no shortage of dreamy, destination-ready dresses.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 30

Amazon Wedding Guest Dresses

If your calendar is stacked with engagement parties and weddings this summer, don’t sleep on Amazon for special occasion dresses. Whether the dress code is black tie, cocktail, or casual destination, there’s a wide range of standout options. Consider an on-trend halter neckline or a vibrant puff-sleeve mini for a playful look. Dainty lace details and detachable scarves are also styles you’ll reach for again and again.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

19 of 30

Warmer weather calls for skin-baring looks — and a mini dress is a must. We found styles perfect for everyday wear, vacations, wedding events, and even the office (hello, button-down swing silhouettes). We’re especially eyeing picnic-ready, fruit-print styles and preppy tennis dresses. Pair them with raffia accessories and your favorite retro sneakers for an effortlessly summery feel.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

25 of 30

Amazon Maxi Dresses

Easy, breezy, and versatile, a maxi dress is a summer staple. Amazon is your one-stop shop for fresh options, from breathable linens to stretchy satins in nautical stripes and sunset hues — style them with Fisherman sandals or thong kitten heels for different vibes.
